<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/pbxes/{pbxId}/sites/{siteId}/queues"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the list of queues for the given pbx and site.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

Queues can be sorted also by extension.","schema":{"type":"string","example":"name,ASC"}}]}
>
